title: I have an issue with my champion selection screen
body:
I have an issue with my champion selection screen and i took a screen shot of it. It seems that my champions are duplicating?
http://www.mythicservers.com/custom/images/mythic/Drk4X.png

I just wanted to bring this to riots attention

replies.body: Has happened to me before, my friends in the same game didn't experience it.
i felt like i was playing a matching game when i was looking at the picture

Its odd. They can ban lets say kassadin, and yet i have the option to select him, when i do select him, it selects another champion entirely. As if the icons are not right. It happens probably every 1 out of 5 games. Im not sure if I should repair my client or what but it can been happening since the last patch (3.1.2) i believe
Does that mean you could ban Kass for the other team AND THEN PICK KASSADIN??

Hey IMythikos,

Not going to lie, I had to stare at your screenshot for about 5 minutes before I finally found the issue you were referencing.  I have to say that I've never seen this issue before.  Does this consistently happen?  Or was this only a one-time occurrence?  

I look forward to your response!
